com.jgcomptech.tools.authenication

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jgcomptech.tools.authenication.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all user accounts in the database.
    Since:
    1.4.0

        Creates a new user in the database using SHA-512 password hashing.

        username - the username to add
        password - the password for the new user
        userRole - the system user role for the new user
        Returns:
        true if user creation is successful

        TableNotFoundException - if users table is missing
